column4: Tourism;Sihanoukville: At 17:00 on the 15th of December 2018
column5: six Chinese people have rented three jet skis. After setting out to razz around a nearby island
column6: only 2 returned at 17 ------:------ 30.------Waterway tourist police set off to find the missing tourist
column7: and found him drifting approximately 17 kilometers away from Ochheuteal thje following morning.
